channel.title: Silabs Client Errors
channel.description:
Ok on here I will explain how to fix some errors with Silabs client
First of all install the current JDK if you havent done so already. http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
[IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/java.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/java2.jpg[/img]
Then Just download and install.
Ok now were gonna set some Variabls shall we :D -Go to start and right click my computer when you right click my computer you click properties. [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/variables.jpg[/img]
-Then you go to Advanced once you are at advanced click Environment Variables [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/variables2.jpg[/img]
-Alright after you opened Environment Variables now you see a top and bottom boxes in the bottom box click new. And top and bottom boxes should look like this... [code]ClassPath C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;.[/code] Exactly like that. [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/variables3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/variables4.jpg[/img]
-Now once you have done that scroll down until you see Path as a variable name once you have found it double click it, and then go to the very end of the variable value and paste this...
[code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;.[/code]
[code] Path %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;c:\Python22;C:\Program Files\Common Files\Adobe\AGL;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;.[/code]
[IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/variables5.jpg[/img]
That should fix all the problems with running the client ;)

item.title: Silabs Client Errors
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Ok on here I will explain how to fix some errors with Silabs client

First of all install the current JDK if you havent done so already.
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp


java2.jpg795×153

Then Just download and install.

Ok now were gonna set some Variabls shall we
-Go to start and right click my computer when you right click my computer you click properties.

-Then you go to Advanced once you are at advanced click Environment Variables

-Alright after you opened Environment Variables now you see a top and bottom boxes in the bottom box click new. And top and bottom boxes should look like this…

ClassPath C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;.
Exactly like that.

-Now once you have done that scroll down until you see Path as a variable name once you have found it double click it, and then go to the very end of the variable value and paste this…

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;.

Path %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;c:\Python22;C:\Program Files\Common Files\Adobe\AGL;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;.

That should fix all the problems with running the client

Read full topic
